# dotfiles

## yadm

This repository contains the configuration files for the tools I use day-to-day.

I use a simple tool called [yadm](https://github.com/TheLocehiliosan/yadm) to manage my dotfiles. [Yadm Getting Started](https://yadm.io/docs/getting_started#) Or here is a guide: [Yadm：我是如何同步并管理我的 Dotfiles 的？](https://blog.spencerwoo.com/2020/07/how-i-manage-my-dotfiles).
